about.title: About Us
about.description: We are a team of passionate women who are dedicated to helping women live their best lives. Our mission is to empower women to lead healthy lives, one step at a time.
about.missionText: At FG Kompass, our mission is to empower women to lead healthy, balanced lives through holistic wellness. We believe that true health encompasses the mind, body, and spirit, and we are committed to providing science-backed, easy-to-understand insights and authentic guidance from experienced health professionals. Our goal is to create a supportive community that values empowerment, self-care, and lifelong wellness.
about.storyText: FG Kompass was founded in 2020 by a group of women who were passionate about holistic wellness. We saw a need for a platform that would provide womenwith reliable, science-backed information on nutrition, fitness, mental health, and women's health. Our mission is to empower women to lead healthy lives, one step at a time.
about.historyText: Since our founding, we have grown into a team of expert health professionals who are dedicated to providing women with the best possible information and resources. We are committed to helping women live their best lives, and we are proud to be a part of the women's health community.
about.value2: Authentic guidance from experienced health professionals
about.value3: A supportive community that values empowerment
about.team: Our Team consists of expert health professionals in nutrition, fitness, mental health, and women's health, who are passionate about helping women lead healthy lives.
